title: Fergyville Episode 1: The New Plan
description: - Genre: Mystery/Drama Serial Novel Installment - Fergyville Episode 1: The New Plan is the first of 12 novelettes in the Fergyville series.- Episode 2 will be released late July, 2011.Synopsis:Frank and Catherine are parents worn down by three young children, and life. As they try to come up with a new, more efficient, way of managing their lives, they are met with a series of unforeseen obstacles. When Frank gets home from work, things don't seem quite right. He begins to wonder if some of the problems experienced by his family are in fact the work of malicious people from his past.
author: Katina Bertrand-Ferguson
